rulebase {
    security {
        rules {
            allow-web-traffic {
                description "Allow web traffic from trust to untrust";
                from trust;
                to untrust;
                source any;
                destination any;
                application web-browsing;
                application ssl;
                service application-default;
                action allow;
                log-end yes;
                profile-setting {
                    group best-practices;
                }
            }
            allow-dns {
                description "Allow DNS queries";
                from trust;
                to untrust;
                source any;
                destination dns-servers;
                application dns;
                service application-default;
                action allow;
                log-end yes;
            }
            block-high-risk {
                description "Block high risk applications";
                from any;
                to any;
                source any;
                destination any;
                application high-risk;
                service any;
                action deny;
                log-end yes;
            }
            overly-permissive-rule {
                from any;
                to any;
                source any;
                destination any;
                application any;
                service any;
                action allow;
                log-end yes;
            }
            no-logging-rule {
                description "Rule without logging";
                from trust;
                to dmz;
                source 10.0.0.0/8;
                destination dmz-servers;
                application any;
                service application-default;
                action allow;
            }
            deny-all {
                description "Default deny rule";
                from any;
                to any;
                source any;
                destination any;
                application any;
                service any;
                action deny;
                log-end yes;
            }
        }
    }
    nat {
        rules {
            outbound-nat {
                description "Outbound NAT for internal networks";
                from trust;
                to untrust;
                source 10.0.0.0/8;
                destination any;
                service any;
                source-translation {
                    dynamic-ip-and-port {
                        interface-address {
                            interface ethernet1/1;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            inbound-web-nat {
                from untrust;
                to untrust;
                source any;
                destination 1.2.3.4;
                service tcp-80;
                destination-translation {
                    translated-address 10.0.1.10;
                    translated-port 80;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
